backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing orders with creation, status updates, payment confirmation, and timeline tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend components, hooks, configs, and utilities.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file preserving the Android platform directory in version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app ID, name, web directory, and Android build settings.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the React app with meta tags, PWA manifest, and script loader.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Ads.txt declaration listing the authorized Google AdSense publisher account.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Placeholder ensuring the downloads directory is tracked in Git.
frontend/public/downloads/README.md: Documentation for managing and building downloadable customer and admin APK files.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theming, and application icons.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Guide explaining how to build the Android APK for the React app using Capacitor.
frontend/scripts/verify-build.sh: Shell script automating frontend build verification, type checking, linting, and build execution.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing between user interface and admin dashboard, APK download logic, order flow, and global modals.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Admin-only APK download button that checks availability and shows error messaging.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing orders, filters, statistics, settings, and admin APK download.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Modal for entering and validating a 4‑digit admin PIN, storing token and handling errors.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Side sheet showing full order details with status selection and async status updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: UI filters for admin orders list, allowing selection of payment and order status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Admin table listing orders with formatted fields, status badges, and a view‑details action.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerSetti: Owner‑level settings section exposing AdSense configuration via AdsSettingsPanel.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsHeadInjec: Injects the ad provider’s head script at runtime when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Renders an ad slot by mounting configured snippets when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsSettingsP: Dialog for configuring AdSense settings, validating input, extracting client ID, and saving to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: Order form allowing selection of plate type and quantity, validating minimum order rules, and submitting orders.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Displays founder photo with fallback handling and size options.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Modal shown after an order to handle payment steps, UPI interactions, WhatsApp links, and confirmation submission.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Timed promotional popup prompting users to order, dismissible and tracked via session storage.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Generic modal for showing messages with optional WhatsApp link copying.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ads config structure and helpers to generate AdSense head and slot snippets.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Static configuration for customer and admin APK download metadata.
frontend/src/config/ownerPhotos.ts: Centralized URLs for founder images in multiple resolutions.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines business UPI ID, delivery charge, and business name for payment handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Tracks admin authorization state by reacting to URL hash changes and token presence.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all orders for admin view when authorized, refreshing periodically.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdsConfig.ts: Builds runtime ads configuration based on user settings, environment, and admin mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a mutation to create orders via the backend actor and invalidates order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth client, login state, and exposes identity context to components.
Mutation hook to update an order’s status and refresh admin order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Updates payment confirmation data for an order and invalidates order queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling with a warm color palette and utility animations for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Parses, validates, sets, and clears admin PIN tokens stored in the URL hash.
frontend/src/lib/ads.ts: Safely injects ad provider scripts and mounts or unmounts ad slot HTML snippets.
frontend/src/lib/adsenseSnippet.ts: Parses pasted AdSense snippets and extracts a validated ca-pub client ID.
frontend/src/lib/adsOwnerSettings.ts: Handles loading, saving, clearing, validating, and subscribing to AdSense owner settings stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Checks APK availability and size, and provides download helpers for customer and admin APK configs.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum delivery quantity rules and provides related validation and messaging helpers.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeEnvironment.ts: Detects whether the app is running in a Capacitor environment or a standard web browser.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Builds UPI payment links and attempts to open Paytm, Google Pay, or generic UPI apps, with clipboard support.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs against basic format and placeholder patterns and provides an error message helper.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links for order, payment confirmation, and screenshot requests, with open helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, animations, and content paths.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tools, enabling strict mode and ESNext module resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliases, dev proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, known issues, and new feature requests for moving ad settings into the admin panel.
